text: Julio César Gandarilla Bermejo (1943 - 24 November 2020) was a Cuban military official and politician. He was born in Matanzas, Cuba. He was a rear admiral for the Cuban Revolutionary Armed Forces. From 2017 until his death, he was the Minister of the Interior. Gandarilla Bermejo died of a long-illness in Havana on 24 November 2020 at the age of 77.Falleció el Vicealmirante Julio Cesar Gandarilla Bermejo ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Cuban military people Category:Cuban politicians
title: Julio César Gandarilla Bermejo
